INSERT INTO history
id,
code,
loginName,
displayName,

userIds,

mapper.update:
UPDATE history
id = #{id},
code = #{code},
loginName = #{loginName},
displayName = #{displayName},
versionNO = #{versionNO},
userIds = #{userIds},
type = #{type},
preCodeId = #{preCodeId},
codeId = #{codeId},
currentFlag = #{currentFlag},
addDate = #{addDate},
addIp = #{addIp},
addUser = #{addUser},
modifyDate = #{modifyDate},
modifyIp = #{modifyIp},
modifyUser = #{modifyUser},
WHERE id = #{id}
AND modified = #{original}
mapper.select: SELECT id, code, loginName, displayName, versionNO, userIds, type, preCodeId, codeId, currentFlag, addDate, addIp, addUser, modifyDate, modifyIp, modifyUser FROM history WHERE addDate=(select max(addDate) from history) AND userIds = #{userIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR} LIMIT 1
